panels.description: Only one instance should be a leader at a given point of time in every zone
panels.title: Leader

panels.description: Number of ADS messages exchanged between Control Plane and Dataplane over XDS
panels.title: XDS message exchange

panels.description: Number of Envoy XDS config generations per second. Config is sent only when it's different than previously generated. The value should be the number of connected dataplanes * KUMA_XDS_SERVER_DATAPLANE_CONFIGURATION_REFRESH_INTERVAL
panels.title: XDS config generations

panels.description: How much it took to generate Envoy configuration for a single dataplane
panels.title: Latency of XDS config generation (99th percentile)

panels.description: How much it took to deliver Envoy configuration and receive ACK/NACK for a single dataplane
panels.title: Latency of XDS config delivery (99th percentile)

panels.description:
Cache protects ClusterLoadAssignments resources by sharing them between many goroutines which reconcile Dataplanes.

hit - request was retrieved from the cache.

hit-wait - request was retrieved from the cache after waiting for a concurrent request to fetch it from the database.

miss - request was fetched from the database

Refer to https://kuma.io/docs/latest/documentation/fine-tuning/#snapshot-generation
panels.title: Endpoints cache performance

panels.description:
Mesh Cache protects hashes calculated periodically for each Mesh in order to avoid the excessive generation of xDS resources.

hit - request was retrieved from the cache.

hit-wait - request was retrieved from the cache after waiting for a concurrent request to fetch it from the database.

miss - request was fetched from the database

Refer to https://kuma.io/docs/latest/documentation/fine-tuning/#snapshot-generation
panels.title: Mesh resources hash cache performance

panels.description: Number of Envoy HDS config generations per second. Config is sent only when it's different than previously generated. The value should be the number of connected dataplanes * KUMA_DP_SERVER_HDS_REFRESH_INTERVAL
panels.title: HDS config generations

panels.description: How much it took to generate Envoy configuration for a single dataplane
panels.title: Latency of HDS config generation (99th percentile)
API Server - Management of the Control Plane
Latency of API Server Requests (99th percentile)

panels.description: XDS and SDS requests are not taken into account because they are long-running requests
panels.title: Latency of Dataplane Server Requests (99th percentile)

panels.description: XDS and SDS requests are not taken into account because they are long-running requests
panels.title: Response Codes

panels.description: This metric presents if policies are properly propagated from Global to Zones. All instances of global and zones in the system should have the same number of policies. This metric have additional latency of 1 minute (it is not computed on the fly when scraping is done)
panels.title: Policies count (sync check)

panels.description: This metric presents if Dataplanes are properly propagated from Zones to Global. Keep in mind that Dataplanes from all zones != Dataplanes from global. All zones receive additional one dataplane of Ingress from other Zones. This metric have additional latency of 1 minute (it is not computed on the fly when scraping is done)
panels.title: Dataplane count

panels.description: Number of zone CP connected to Global.
panels.title: Global - KDS active connections

panels.description: Number of KDS messages exchanged between Global Control Plane and Zone Control Plane over KDS. Global sends to Zone policies and Ingress Dataplanes
panels.title: Global - KDS message exchange

panels.description: Number of KDS config generations per second. Config is sent only when it's different than previously generated. The value should be the number of connected control planes * KUMA_MULTIZONE_GLOBAL_KDS_REFRESH_INTERVAL
panels.title: Global - KDS config generations

panels.description: How much it took to generate KDS configuration for a single zone control plane
panels.title: Global - Latency of KDS config generation (99th percentile)

panels.description: How much it took to deliver Envoy configuration and receive ACK/NACK for a single dataplane
panels.title: Global - Latency of KDS config delivery (99th percentile)

panels.description: Number of global CP connected to Zone.
panels.title: Zone - KDS active connections

panels.description: Number of KDS messages exchanged between Global Control Plane and Zone Control Plane over KDS. Zone sends to Global its Dataplanes and DataplaneInsights
panels.title: Zone - KDS message exchange

panels.description: Number of KDS config generations per second. Config is sent only when it's different than previously generated. The value should be the number of connected control planes * KUMA_MULTIZONE_ZONE_KDS_REFRESH_INTERVAL
panels.title: Zone - KDS config generations

panels.description: How much it took to generate KDS configuration for a global control plane
panels.title: Zone - Latency of KDS config generation (99th percentile)

panels.description: How much it took to deliver Envoy configuration and receive ACK/NACK for a single dataplane
panels.title: Global - Latency of KDS config delivery (99th percentile)

panels.description: Latency of underlying storage (API Server on K8S, Postgres on Universal etc.)
panels.title: Latency of Store operations (99th percentile)

panels.description:
Cache protects underlying storage by sharing responses between many goroutines accessing the storage.

hit - request was retrieved from the cache.

hit-wait - request was retrieved from the cache after waiting for a concurrent request to fetch it from the database.

miss - request was fetched from the database

Refer to https://kuma.io/docs/latest/documentation/fine-tuning/#snapshot-generation
panels.title: Store cache performance

panels.description: Real requests executed on the underlying storage (Postgres/Kubernetes API Server)
panels.title: Store operations
